attributes.action: Remove VAT from canine health testing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment VAT is charged on canine hip scoring, elbow scoring and eye testing. In an effort to encourage more breeders to health test their breeding stock by virtue of the lowering of the cost, resulting in the breeding of healthier puppies, could the Prime Minister please look into making these tests zero rated?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove VAT from canine health testing."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22642


Prime Minister's Office
